Local Laravel packages require path repository configuration in composer.json under 'repositories' section with type 'path' and url pointing to package directory
Use '@dev' version constraint for local packages (e.g., 'package-name': '@dev') to allow development stability while maintaining composer requirements
Package configuration files should reference config/services.php for flexibility using pattern: config('services.key', env('ENV_KEY'))
Service layer should handle configuration fallback: config('package.key') ?? config('services.key') to allow flexibility while maintaining Laravel conventions
Package service providers should merge config from package config directory during register() method using mergeConfigFrom()
Package commands should be registered in boot() method only when running in console using if ($this->app->runningInConsole()) check
Package config can be published using $this->publishes() with a tag for easy customization by consuming applications
When developing local packages, symlink them via Composer path repository rather than copying files to enable live development
Package namespace should match Composer package name structure for proper autoloading and service provider discovery
